results.title: The Cat Piano
results.brief_description: A city of singing cats is preyed upon by a shadowy figure intent on performing a twisted feline symphony.

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

results.description: A city of singing cats is preyed upon by a shadowy figure intent on performing a twisted feline symphony.
description_for_label: A city of singing cats is preyed upon by a shadowy figure intent on performing a twisted feline symphony.

results.title: The Case Against Adnan Syed
results.creator_credit: Instinct Productions, Working Title Television, HBO Documentary Films, HBO and Amy J. Berg
results.brief_description: Explore the 1999 disappearance and murder of 18-year-old Baltimore County high school student Hae Min Lee, and the subsequent conviction of her ex-boyfriend, Adnan Syed, a case brought to global attention by the hugely popular Serial podcast.

constellations_other.name: Reasonable doubt
constellations_other.description: Factual media has the power to reframe information and put forth new, persuasive arguments.  For the criminal justice system, where convictions are made based on arguments being convincing beyond a reasonable doubt, True Crime media has the ability to create doubt, right the wrongs of the justice system, and shed new light on closed cases.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Instinct Productions, Working Title Television, HBO Documentary Films, HBO and Amy J. Berg
results.description: Explore the 1999 disappearance and murder of 18-year-old Baltimore County high school student Hae Min Lee, and the subsequent conviction of her ex-boyfriend, Adnan Syed, a case brought to global attention by the hugely popular Serial podcast.

video_links.name: The Case Against Adnan Syed (2019) | Official Trailer | HBO

results.title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
results.brief_description: The Cabinet of Dr Caligari is considered one of the very first horror movies, featuring an unreliable narrator and establishing horror movie tropes and styles. It’s the story of a mad hypnotist using a sleep-walker to terrorise a small town. Or is it?

constellations_other.name: Monsters, murder and mystery
constellations_other.description: Murder and mystery hide in the shadows born from German Expressionism.

results.description: Francis, a young man, recalls in his memory the horrible experiences he and his fiancée Jane recently went through. Francis and his friend Alan visit The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari, an exhibit where the mysterious doctor shows the somnambulist Cesare, and awakens him for some moments from his death-like sleep.
description_for_label: Francis, a young man, recalls in his memory the horrible experiences he and his fiancée Jane recently went through. Francis and his friend Alan visit The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari, an exhibit where the mysterious doctor shows the somnambulist Cesare, and awakens him for some moments from his death-like sleep.

results.title: The Bureau of Magical Things
results.brief_description: When ordinary teenager Kyra touches a mysterious book, she is transformed into a Tri-ling-–part-human, part-fairy and part-elf. In addition to acquiring amazing magical powers, Kyra discovers a secret world of magic all around her.

constellations_other.name: Tony Ayres
constellations_other.description: Charts the acclaimed career of Tony Ayres through his work in film and TV.

results.description: When ordinary teenager Kyra touches a mysterious book, she is transformed into a Tri-ling-–part-human, part-fairy and part-elf. In addition to acquiring amazing magical powers, Kyra discovers a secret world of magic all around her.

results.title: The Brothers Bloom
results.creator_credit: Ram Bergman Productions, Tom Karnowski and Matthew J. Birch
results.brief_description: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they’ve decided to take on one last job – showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

constellations_other.name: Powerful women in the frame and behind the scenes
constellations_other.description: Lady Sarah (Rachel Weisz) exudes power in The Favourite. These female filmmakers and actors do too.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ram Bergman Productions, Tom Karnowski and Matthew J. Birch
results.description: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they’ve decided to take on one last job – showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

results.title: The Breadwinner
results.brief_description: A headstrong young girl in Afghanistan, ruled by the Taliban, disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.
results.description: A headstrong young girl in Afghanistan, ruled by the Taliban, disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.
description_for_label: A headstrong young girl in Afghanistan, ruled by the Taliban, disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

results.title: The Blob
results.creator_credit: Tonylyn Productions Inc., Valley Forge Films, Fairview Productions and Kate Phillips
results.brief_description: A drive-in favorite, this sci-fi classic follows teenagers Steve and his best girl, Jane, as they try to protect their hometown from a gelatinous alien life form that engulfs everything it touches. The first to discover the substance and live to tell about it, Steve and Jane witness the blob destroying an elderly man, then it growing to a terrifying size. But no one else has seen the goo, and policeman Dave refuses to believe the kids without proof.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tonylyn Productions Inc., Valley Forge Films, Fairview Productions and Kate Phillips

results.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
results.creator_credit: David Valdes, Brad Pitt, Ridley Scott, Dede Gardner, Andrew Dominik, Jules Daly, Plan B Entertainment, Virtual Studios, Scott Free Productions, Alberta Film Entertainment, Jesse Films Inc., Warner Bros. Pictures and Patricia Norris
results.headline_credit: Canada, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2007
results.brief_description: Outlaw Jesse James is rumored to be the ‘fastest gun in the West’. An eager recruit into James’ notorious gang, Robert Ford eventually grows jealous of the famed outlaw and, when Robert and his brother sense an opportunity to kill James, their murderous action elevates their target to near mythical status.

constellations_other.name: Eric Bana
constellations_other.description: There must be something that draws Australian creatives like Eric Bana to darker material as they shoot to stardom overseas. Australia's penal colony past perhaps?

results.title: The Aristocats
results.creator_credit: Frank Thomas, Eric Cleworth, Julius Svendsen, Winston Hibler, Ralph Wright, Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Productions, Wolfgang Reitherman, Larry Clemmons, Ken Anderson and Vance Gerry
results.brief_description: When Madame Adelaide Bonfamille leaves her fortune to Duchess and her children—Bonfamille’s beloved family of cats—the butler plots to steal the money and kidnaps the legatees, leaving them out on a country road. All seems lost until the wily Thomas O’Malley Cat and his jazz-playing alley cats come to the aristocats’ rescue.

constellations_other.name: Raising the Roof: on-screen levity on rooftop
constellations_other.description: Performances soar to new heights on the rooftop, not only showcasing skylines but also creating electrifying drama, comedy and spectacle.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Frank Thomas, Eric Cleworth, Julius Svendsen, Winston Hibler, Ralph Wright, Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Productions, Wolfgang Reitherman, Larry Clemmons, Ken Anderson and Vance Gerry
results.description: When Madame Adelaide Bonfamille leaves her fortune to Duchess and her children—Bonfamille’s beloved family of cats—the butler plots to steal the money and kidnaps the legatees, leaving them out on a country road. All seems lost until the wily Thomas O’Malley Cat and his jazz-playing alley cats come to the aristocats’ rescue.

results.title: The Americans
results.creator_credit: DreamWorks Television, David Woods, Dan Davis and Katie Irish
results.brief_description: Set during the Cold War period in the 1980s, The Americans is the story of Elizabeth and Philip Jennings, two Soviet KGB officers posing as an American married couple in the suburbs of Washington D.C. and their neighbor, Stan Beeman, an FBI Counterintelligence agent.

constellations_other.name: My Hometown: Archives woven into new narrative
constellations_other.description: Offering viewers a snapshot of life on the road for an Australian touring band in the 1960s, 'My Hometown', directed by Sari Braithwaite was developed reimagining archival 8mm footage shot by drummer Leon Isackson.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.
